THE TREND OF US STARTUP ACTIVITY







The Rate of New Entrepreneurs in the economy:

the percentage of adults becoming entrepreneurs in a given month.



The Opportunity Share of New Entrepreneurs:

the percentage of new entrepreneurs driven primarily by “opportunity” vs. “necessity.”



The Startup Density of a region:

the number of new employer businesses, normalized by the business population.
